definition.name: Lighthouse CI Action
definition.description: Audit URLs using Lighthouse and test performance with Lighthouse CI

inputs.name: budgetPath
inputs.description: Path to a Lighthouse budgets.json file

inputs.name: configPath
inputs.description: Path to a LHCI lighthouserc.json file

inputs.name: uploadArtifacts
inputs.description: Opt-out of saving Lighthouse results as an action artifacts

inputs.name: artifactName
inputs.description: Name of the artifact group if using uploadArtifacts. default: lighthouse-results

inputs.name: runs
inputs.description: Number of runs to do per URL

inputs.name: serverToken
inputs.description: API token to push to LHCI server

inputs.name: basicAuthUsername
inputs.description: Basic auth username for LHCI server

inputs.name: basicAuthPassword
inputs.description: Basic auth password for LHCI server

outputs.name: resultsPath
outputs.description: Path to the folder with LHCI results

outputs.name: links
outputs.description: Links to compare/result UI for each URL (content of links.json)

evidence.reasoning: The Lighthouse CI Action is focused on auditing URLs and testing performance, which falls under testing and code quality categories.
